purpose: The email announces a recruitment for an Associate Professor position (W2) in Software Engineering for Safety Critical Systems at TU Braunschweig, Germany. It highlights the qualifications sought in candidates, particularly in system design and analysis for safety and security requirements. The email also lists relevant research topics such as Model Checking, Static and Dynamic Program Analysis, Solver Technology, Programming Languages, and Synthesis. The sender encourages recipients to reach out with questions and to share the opportunity with interested colleagues.
